alert.note: Alert for Jackson (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 30 at 5:59PM CDT until May 30 at 6:30PM CDT by NWS Topeka
info.description: The National Weather Service in Topeka has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Jackson County in northeastern Kansas... * Until 630 PM CDT. * At 558 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 4 miles northeast of Delia, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Holton, Mayetta, Whiting, Denison, Delia and Potawatomi Reservation. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 100 AM CDT for northeastern Kansas. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 100 AM CDT for northeastern Kansas.
